description:
We found Cody lying in bed the other day, so we decided to wake him up. He was reluctant to turn over, knowing we had the camera with us, but after some persuasion, Cody agreed to give us a show.

After his shower, he walks outside in a robe and finishes himself off on the back steps; unloading his balls onto himself and the walkway, bring an end to another hot Cody Cummings scene.

Enjoy!
title: Cody masturbates for your viewing fun
